definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[זאב]] (√ of foll.; acc. to Fl:Bericht d. sächs. G. d. W. i. (1846–47) 430 f. = Kleinere Schriften iii. 212 f. i.q. Ar. d-a0’ana drive away, and despise, drive or frighten away, whence d-iy’bun, di0bo0, [[זְאֵב]] wolf, as driven or chased away; cf. Hom:NS 304 MV al.)
